basics.summary: I am studying for a BBA in Marketing and Management Information Systems at the University of Hawaii at Manoa. I expect to graduate in Fall 2023.

education.institution: University of Hawaii at Manoa, Honolulu, HI
education.area: Marketing and Management Information Systems (expected Fall, 2023)

highlights: Miscellaneous clerical work including making phone calls to families, mailing, and making copies
Organize and maintain a computer lab booking schedule for teachers and staff
Created an online staff directory to be used in-house
Designed and created school flyers, certificates/website posts, and newsletters
Tracked contract renewals for the Technical Infrastructure team through the utilization of a database
Organized and produced requisitions and other essential documents to help staff members with the procurement of products and services
Maintained an annual budget report that contained all hardware and software contracts for the year

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.summary: Awarded to students who earned a GPA of 3.5 or higher.
